info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STORMY AFTERNOON FOR THE SANTEE COOPER LAKES... Numerous thunderstorms will impact Lake Moultrie and the eastern portions of Lake Marion through 6 PM. These thunderstorms will be capable of producing wind gusts in excess of 30 knots, frequent cloud to water lightning and localized visibilities of 1 NM or less in heavy rainfall. Periods of locally higher waves can also be expected. Mariners are urged to seek safe harbor now before the strongest storms arrive.
info.instruction: If caught on the open water, stay as low as possible and wear a personal flotation device. Remember, if you can hear thunder you are at risk for being struck by lightning. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio All Hazards or the Internet for the latest information from the National Weather Service.
